about_the_game:
The last cylinder

80 kilometers of spinning metal rock adrift in space, far, far into the future - humanity's final outpost.

Inside this massive space habitat, centuries of famine, disease, war have eroded our once-mighty civilization into a medieval post-apocalyptic society and stripped away our technological heights.

You enter this world with randomly assigned attributes - strength, stamina, and agility. Your mission is clear: traverse the cylinder's expanse to enhance these traits and stay alive at all costs. Born with advantages or flaws beyond your control, you must adapt to survive.

Most don't make it past several hours, but hopefully you can and bring change to our broken world.

1. Humble Beginnings As A Simple Village Dweller

Starting in a cluster of medieval huts, you must quickly master the basics - finding water, gathering food supplies to quench your thirst and hunger and to maintain your strength. Though the cylinder seems empty at first, other survivors will soon arrive. Some will become allies. Some want lure you into deadly traps.

Choose your path carefully.

Will you embrace the rugged path of a daring explorer or for the ways of a simple village dweller thriving amid the bonds of community to increase your attributes unassumingly and elevate yourself into the steampunk area?

2. Adventure Awaits

Unleash your inner adventurer, and explore each and every dip and hill inside the habitat, from soaring mountains and lush meadows to serene lakes and freshwater rivers; and immerse yourself in the quiet hamlets and bustling villages peppered across the cylinder.

As you traverse this untamed land, battling countless perils, you'll be growing stronger and stronger, honing your skills and mastering the arts indispensable for survival.

With every kilometer traversed, you will gain 2% strength, running speed via agility, and stamina to cover even greater distances without experiencing fatigue.
Complete quests for additional stat increases.

3. Rise Through The Ranks

Days of survival forge you into someone extraordinary. Your heightened abilities - earned through countless trials - will give you physical prowess that not many can match.

Master the art of leadership through voice communication ('V' key). Build alliances, coordinate raids, and establish your tribe in this harsh world. What begins as simple survival can evolve into true influence as others recognize your strength and wisdom.

Your reputation grows with each challenge overcome. Territory expands under your control. Former rivals become steadfast allies. Though competition remains fierce, the potential rewards are limitless for those skilled enough to seize them.

Make new allies, and challenge yourself as you build a reputation among the stars. Witness your physical prowess and societal influence reach staggering heights with each day you survive as you break through barriers that would have once seemed insurmountable. Expand your territory, forge alliances with like-minded compatriots, and become a leader truly worth following. Know that the competition will be fierce, but the rewards, limitless.

But remember adventurer: You only have 1 life, leaving you with a single question to answer:

How long will you survive?

content_descriptors.notes: Characters can fight with each other and also die.

name: Starwalker - The Last Cylinder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2060, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-Compatible Audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 3070, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-Compatible Audio device

short_description: Interstellar Spacepunk Survival Permadeath MMORPG. Survive in humanity's final outpost, far far into the future. Traverse the untamed land, overcome countless perils across each and every dip & hill, mountains, lush meadows and serene lakes, make new allies and build a reputation among the stars.
